name: Perform evaluation on a preconfigured inference unit without essential evaluation criteria

steps.name: Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for image multiclass classification
And an evaluation plan with no criteria for image multiclass classification
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then a successful result indicating all criteria passed is computed
Then macro average of the precision metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the recall metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the f1 metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the rocauc metric is calculated to be 1.0
Then macro average of the acc metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then the precision metric for class name 0 is calculated to be 0.91
Then the recall metric for class name 1 is calculated to be 1.0
Then the f1 metric for class name 2 is calculated to be 0.9
Then the rocauc metric for class name 3 is calculated to be 1.0
Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for vision classification with a relative path type and a batch size of 1
And an evaluation plan with no criteria for image multiclass classification
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then a successful result indicating all criteria passed is computed
Then macro average of the precision metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the recall metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the f1 metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the rocauc metric is calculated to be 1.0
Then macro average of the acc metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then the precision metric for class name 0 is calculated to be 0.91
Then the recall metric for class name 1 is calculated to be 1.0
Then the f1 metric for class name 2 is calculated to be 0.9
Then the rocauc metric for class name 3 is calculated to be 1.0
Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for vision classification with a absolute path type and a batch size of 1
And an evaluation plan with no criteria for image multiclass classification
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then a successful result indicating all criteria passed is computed
Then macro average of the precision metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the recall metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the f1 metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then macro average of the rocauc metric is calculated to be 1.0
Then macro average of the acc metric is calculated to be 0.88
Then the precision metric for class name 0 is calculated to be 0.91
Then the recall metric for class name 1 is calculated to be 1.0
Then the f1 metric for class name 2 is calculated to be 0.9
Then the rocauc metric for class name 3 is calculated to be 1.0

fullName: It must be possible to assess that an image multiclass classification inference unit behaves as intended: Perform evaluation on a preconfigured inference unit without essential evaluation criteria

labels.name: feature
labels.value: It must be possible to assess that an image multiclass classification inference unit behaves as intended
